title: Does using a Chinese smartphone hurt the eyes? - Quora

response.answer_text: All phones,laptops and televisions can damage vision of your eyes eventually,with age vision starts getting affected but increased screen time of a person amplifies the damage,We are dependent on phones for our livelihood and cannot work in today's world without them so its Better to use screens for blocking radiation on your phones laptops desktops so there is less eye strain because of devices plus increase ur number of hours of sleep for proper rest to eyes for long term use of eyes.check zero eye strain glass screens on stillersafe website. Whether its an iPhone or a Chinese phone all phones cause gradual vision loss.
